constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 48 (Thursday, March 17, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. O'HALLERAN:
H.R. 7136.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Clause 18, section 8 of article 1 of the Constitution
[Page H3828]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on House Administration, and in addition to the Committee on Rules, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: No Flights Act
